Name: The Cottage
Review Text: This is the greatest Sunday roast available in the Netherlands. The lamb roast was absolutely spectacular and provided truly authentic British energy. Make sure to get the desert. This restaurant has a 3 layer ginger cake made by the gods, and a scone cake with custard that can make a grown man cry.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Lovely British cuisine inspired place, the food was delicious and the portions were well served. They have a great selection of beers! The staff was very nice, we felt really welcomed. Will definitely go again!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Come just before peak hours to secure a table and good service. The food‚Äôs great, and priced accordingly. The servers / chef will also adapt the menu to your needs. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: We got the lamb pie and Sunday roast. It was really tasty. We saw the table next to us asked for extra Yorkshire puddings with the roast so we asked for extra too. However after we got the plate we were told it's not possible as the chef ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: I‚Äôve had the Sunday roast and chicken pie. The roast was a few thin cuts of beef with potatoes and vegetables comprising the majority of the dish (overpriced). The chicken pie was ok. This restaurant is a bit overpriced - nothing special at all. Servers were rather nice and the atmosphere was chill.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Visiting from New Zealand and was very happy with the beef pie! Tasted just like home, it was delicious. Great selection of beers too. Very cosy, warm atmosphere. Would come back with more friends for sure.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Visited this place recently with a lot of expectations but was a bit disappointed. Very few choices to choose from. But the food was really tasty. Tried the chicken pie and full English breakfast- which was really nice.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Cute england inspired restaurant! We were there for breakfast and it was awesome! Reasonable prices and relaxed atmosphere. The food was really good- would go there again

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: If you're looking for an English pub experience in Amsterdam, them this is a great option. The food is honestly better than the English pub food equivalent - the pies are outstanding. We had the chicken pie and it was better than most pies ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: They have a great menu and the interior is just lovely! On warmer days it is wonderful to sit outside as well. The curry pie and the salat onside is just delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: A cozy place that is often crowded, but within the crowd you can find the peace. This is a place that is more enjoyable during winter times.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Such a cute place! The staff was super friendly and the sandwiches/toasts are amazing. I enjoyed it so much that I returned in the next day for brunch.. And what a wonderful scone! üòç

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Pies took a weirdly long time to arrive, chicken pie was a bit soup-y. Scones weren't too bad though!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
The Cottage stands for great food & drinks menus, nice people and very tasty Stooker Special Roast coffee.
Served as good coffee should be, with a large amount of tap water on the house! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
I read the reviews and was having my hopes too high, but actually after seeing the size of the pie, got pretty much shocked for 16 EUR !
I want to share a pic of the pie with its size compared to a Spoon, ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: We had a really good English breakfast.  The drinks were nice - the cappuccino was high quality. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Excellent food in a comfortable and friendly atmosphere. They have a great selection of drinks (including non-alcoholic ciders/beers). Don't show up without a reservation unless you're prepared to wait a while.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Very nice place. Cosy atmosphere, very friendly staff. The food was great, especially the scones and scrambled eggs. Prices are quite moderate for Amsterdam, which is another plus. The only negative, if you will, was that the toast the eggs ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Can't speak highly enough of this place. We just turned up and they were extremely busy, but they offered for us to sit down on a bench that was free and order coffee whilst they waited to see what became available, and sure enough, they ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Outstanding staff, a real treat not always seen in Amsterdam anymore. Food is good too. Little different in product and presentation with  even homemade jams. Lot of locals visiting the place and they know them by name (says something). In weekends be on time or make a reservation.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Very nice place for a delicious brunch, ‚Äùbubbly‚Äù atmosphere and nice staff. 10/10!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Amazing place and atmosphere! The beers were delicious and the food just amazing! Will definitely come back again and again!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: THE VEGETARIAN ENGLISH BREAKFAST ü§© So so good, and ridiculously filling! You can choose how you want your eggs and what type of bread. The mushrooms are cooked to perfection and the homemade baked beans are to die for ‚ù§Ô∏è Also: great coffee and cookie

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: I had dinner and everything was super good plus great friendly service. I am looking forward to trying the Sunday Roast ASAP.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great food, cozy atmosphere, but most importantly really friendly and attentive service!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: We've been here for both scones for brunch and the Sunday roast dinner. Both were absolutely delicious and exactly what I was hoping to find when coming to The Cottage. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: The best breakfast in my life!!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
This place is amazing. It is very cosy and I love the little seats at the windows. The staff is super friendly, helpful and clearly know their profession.
I had the fish of the day and all I can say is compliments to the chef. It was ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great place for breakfast. Their scones are to die for. Coffee is good, even by high Amsterdam standards. And their Eggs Benedict were cooked just perfectly. It's good idea to reserve a table, since they can get quite busy, and for a good reason.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: This place was recommended by an expat Brit as a great Sunday evening venue and it did not disappoint.  We enjoyed excellent service,  a great beer menu,  absolutely fantastic roast lamb (their roast special changes each Sunday), and the ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Really nice - we had a late lunch there with great fresh new dishes and interesting taste experiences - everybody was super friendly - hope to go again soon to try the breakfast or dinner and drinks :)

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
Always like the service and great food!
Make a reservation if you are going during weekend. It‚Äôs quite full ( also lovely). ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Delicious scones, good English breakfast.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
Amazing food, lots of gluten free options!
I have celiac and was overwhelmed by how many things I could choose from!
Service was amazing, very friendly!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Love this place when I'm feeling homesick, however misses out in 5* because you don't serve pie with salad! Haha. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
Update: had the full English and it's fan-bloody-tastic!!!

Cracking roast for the English folk! And the bread and scone pudding is a ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Very delicious breakfast and the owners are so kind and welcoming. Highly recommended for a lazy Sunday morning. üòä

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Had really nice evening in here. The food was nice and the drinks as well. Above all the very nice and friendly staff are amazing.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great staff, great food, Everything worked out great. On a cold day, the insides get packed, but there is a lot of seating outside.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
This place is my all time favorite. They just make the perfect omelette!
Service is always perfect as well. Everyone is super friendly and quick.
The only downside is that it is located in a loud street. So, might be noisy.. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
Was waiting to try this restaurant as I had heard good things and I am glad I did.
Service - 5* ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: British the Amsterdam-oost way: The Cottage. We had good coffee and tasty  scones with the best (homemade!) jams. Thank you Cottage cook. We will be back!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Hard to find a nice sunday roast in amsterdam but this place has it. Great food and really nice staff. Already looking forward to next time.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Various kinds of English savoury pies, unique beer and cider collection, friendly service. Great for dinner and drinks. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great food, friendly staff, good atmosphere, what more could you want?

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Awesome spot, was visiting my son, he recommended,  and it didn't disappoint.  The speckled hen was a nice touch.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great food and service! One of the best places to have brunch in Amsterdam :)

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Very very friendly servers, delicious food and very reasonably priced. Would recommend to anyone!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Best british-stlye and fairly cheap place in oost! Trytheir pies

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: One of the best comfort food places in Amsterdam. The food. The service. The place. All fantastic.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Tasty breakfast, friendly staff and service details orientated. Highly recommended if you are in the area üòä

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great breakfast and lunch, very cozy atmosphere and friendly service. Recommend!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great place for English dishes. Slightly overpriced, but I would visit again. Great beer selection

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Super friendly service that speaks very good english and offers help to understand the card and a very nice place to sit down with a drink (they offer amazing organic kombucha!!), a book and just witness the world around you

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Super friendly staff, scrumptious food and tasty coffees. They make their own jams to accompany the scones, the cardamom jam is delish!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: The food was good. Employees look and sound passionate about their work. The team look and sound very organised. Great service. I will come from time to time for the baked egg and chilli.üëåüèøüëåüèøüëåüèø

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Small but friendly; a decent Full English breakfast... with advice on where to find a thicker cut of bacon than is normal in the Netherlands, and an apology/explanation on why no back pudding ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: I will be coming back for the shepherd's pie! The chocolate with salted caramel was so good it should be illegal!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Friendly personnel on a sunny Sunday morning! This is a comfortable, charismatic little place to get a brunch with friends and family. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: English comfort food, special beers, delicious deserts, games, what's not to love? You gotta book your table in The Cottage because the place has become quite popular over time, and with good reason. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: The food is good and style fits. No complaints

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Like everyone says.. excellent eggs , we had omelets and delicious scones! Nice coffee and usually really busy during weekends! The staff is very polite and helpful!

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
Wouldn't hesitate to return here. The food was excellent and the staff were better.
Visited to celebrate a friend's birthday and enjoyed the British style menu and ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Had an amazing Sunday roast here! The place to go for any Brits missing home. Can‚Äôt wait to try the rest of the menu

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: As a Brit I love coming here for the pies! The service is always excellent too, a rarity in Amsterdam for sure. When I need my Yorkshire pudding fix I know where to come. The only thing is, you need to book ahead for Sunday lunch as, rightly so, it's always busy!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Top location. Cozy cafe. Best scones ever. We had the scone of the day: ‚Äúchestnuts and apricot‚Äù. Very attentive service that makes you feel like coming to visit an old friend. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: One of my favourite brunch/lunch places in Amsterdam. Food is good and service is excellent, the best in Amsterdam in my opinion. In the summer there is plenty of outdoor seating and inside is cosy for the winter. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: We had a very nice dinner at this restaurant. The staff was friendly and helpful. The menu has some very good options. We really liked the vegetarian pie and curried cauliflower at this place. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
Wow.

What an amazing experience. Local tasty fresh dishes is always good! We did not ‚Ä¶

Review Text:
Fantastic place if you want a English breakfast. Great scones, homemade jam that is really good! The staff was very good and friendly.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Authentic English food - from breakfast to roast dinner. I enjoyed the veggie breakfast and loved the scone with clotted cream & homemade jams. Whether you like a good strong British tea, a herbal tea or good coffee - they can cater to your taste. Staff were friendly and very sweet in adapting the order to exactly what we wanted.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Lovely spot in the vibrant heart of Amsterdam Oost. Can highly recommend the Sunday roast and the brunch during weekends. The owner and the staff are extremely polite, friendly, happy and they make all the efforts that every customer has a ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Typical english food with a twist and the homemade jams are amazing!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text:
The meat pie! You don't need anything else)
And on Sunday they serve delicious breakfast with a scone.
Service is very friendly and fast. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: When it comes to restaurants, for us, good food is of course the number one priority. Then comes service and atmosphere. It's rare that a place has all three. We were immediately impressed with the food at The Cottage. They get creative ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Delicious roast on a Sunday. Very friendly owners that seem to really be trying to make the best British classics they can. Would recommend for any Brit expats missing a good Sunday roast.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: I'm giving this place a 3 only because of service. The food and drinks I had here are really good. The scrambled eggs on toast with peppers was delicious, and so were the homemade scones. I'm definitely going to go back but we really ‚Ä¶

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: This place is one of a kind. Spectacular food. Ingredients selected with care. Even the cookie of the coffee was incredible :) Smily and polite stuff. Fast service. 5/5. They couldn't make it better. Thanks!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: A mix of Dutch and typical British dishes! I‚Äôm a Brit and I love being in this place. Try a scone, you won‚Äôt regret it! Last time I had the mushrooms on toast with anchovy butter, my mouth is watering just thinking about it!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: As a British expat living in Amsterdam, if ever a Sunday roast fix is needed then this place hits the spot. The staff are always great, friendly and there‚Äôs a warm comforting atmosphere. The scones are insane too!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: The sausage rolls are the stuff dreams are made. Super creative menu and we‚Äôll executed! Awesome selection of fun beers and spirits and service staff is friendly and attentive. Name: The Cottage
Review Text: nice cafe, we had really good breakfast here and enjoyed the atmosphere and friendly service

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: We had the scone with clotted cream and lovely homemade jams with really special flavor combinations and the raisin bread with cheddar. Both was just perfect. And the fresh juice is great, too.

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Definitely one of my favorite places in Amsterdam! Great food, great drinks and a very relaxed and easygoing atmosphere.

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: awesome breakfasts and great coffee. Super cute staff too.

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Very nice breakfast! Good service and nice staff

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: During our week long trip to Amsterdam, The cottage was our favorite food find. We stumbled across this quaint restaurant on a Wednesday evening. It  is set back a bit from the busy street and has an English influence. The staff is the ‚Ä¶

Review Text:

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Great atmosphere, great service. They have scones! And various other interesting food and drink options. My favorite place in my neighbourhood.

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: The reviews were nice but I found it just ok. Not too good for its price. The sandwich was mainly salad.. Not much stuff. The scone was decent

Perfect! Staff is great, menu is concise, prices are reasonable.

Review Text: Graat home made food that's all good,  down to the marmalade and scones. If you can make scrambled eggs into the delicious meal I had on my toast, with home made pickled peppers, then you're up there the top chefs!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Really good comfort brunch!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Nice  place, nice food and nice people attending!

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: Excellent food and coffee. Staff were very friendly also and made an effort to make us comfortable. Highly recommend.

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
Review Text: We had really great food and a very pleasant service. Highly recommended!

Name: The Cottage

Name: The Cottage
